lender.name: kcrich
lender.occupational_info:
K.C. Rich, Inc. - Delivering home improvement solutions to residents of Stafford, Fredericksburg and Spotsylvania since 1996.
K.C. Rich is family owned and operated with a proven history of superior craftsmanship in projects ranging from deck design and building, remodeling, home additions and custom home construction.
Our customers enjoy the security of K.C. Rich being fully insured as well as a Virginia Class A Licensed Contractor – Virginia’s top building contractors license.
We are confident that you will agree with the reputation K.C. Rich has worked hard to earn from our customers:
* Courteous, respectful, professional staff. * Quality workmanship. * Economical performance. * Daily clean-up. * Guaranteed work. * On-time...within budget...always.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: I have a long track record of success - having generated over $200 million in revenue, over 2 million product orders & over 300,000 customer accounts in my last venture. I am most proud of the people that I have helped become successful with many becoming Millionaires based on the products & systems I have created. I have a passion for helping people achieve their dreams and a love for creating life-changing products. I believe strongly in Internet marketing & love to mentor in that arena. I have served on the boards of four international direct sales companies & built several direct sales organizations with some in excess of 100,000 distributors.

lender.name: Melvin Isaak
lender.loan_because: I realize that I am the luckiest guy in the world. I've been thinking of all the blessings I have received, and I know they are all undeserved. I ask no more how others could help me, but how the less fortunate I could serve. ------- Spanish: Me doy cuenta de que yo soy el hombre más afortunado del mundo. He estado pensando en todas las bendiciones que he recibido en mi vida, y se que son inmerecidas. Hoy dia; no me pregunto mas como otros me pueden ayudar, sino, cómo yo puedo servir a los menos afortunados?

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info:
Hi! Thanks for letting me be part of this group. Although I haven't lived in San Francisco my entire life, I pretty much feel like it. I've never really known any place else since grade school.
I'm about to finish college this spring. But I'm thinking about taking another year (and earning another degree) or going straight into grad school. This doesn't seem to be a good time to be going into the job market.
Fortunately, I do make a little extra dough on the side designing websites for insurance agents and brokers. They're actually a different type of websites, because insurance agent websites have to have an embedded insurance quote engine, that allows insurance shoppers to compare multiple plans and complete an online application. The job's not much, but it covers my weekend tab... with a little leftover for the slightly finer things in life.

lender.name: Lighting
lender.occupational_info:
“Bringing together some of the world’s most famous brands in lighting.”
Acuity Brands Lighting’s (ABL) company-direct sales office in New York City opened for business in January 2006. It is a part of the Acuity Brands family which is based in Atlanta that was established back in 2001. Having an annual income of over $2 billion and employing over 10,000 people, Acuity Brands opened for trading on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE: AYI) also in 2001.
Sero Cardamone, VP for New York Business Development, heads the NYC sales office; and together with its local professional staff, the ABL team aims to provide not just excellent lighting solutions but also outstanding service to New York City’s five boroughs and the surrounding counties.
Acuity Brands Lighting (ABL) offers a wide selection of innovative and sustainable lighting solutions from famous brands: Lithonia, Holophane, Gotham, Peerless, Hydrel, Antique Street Lamps, Speclight, MetalOptics and Carandini. For more information on lighting selection and specification, please feel free to contact ABL for more details.
Read more about Lighting New York on these sites:
Lighting Fixtures New York | http://lightingfixturesnewyork.com/
Lighting Store NYC | http://lightingstorenyc.com/
Lighting Company New York | http://lightingcompanynewyork.com/
LEED New York City | http://leednewyorkcity.com/
Lighting New York on Yuwie | http://www.yuwie.com/lightingnewyork
Lighting New York on Migente | http://www.migente.com/lightingnewyork/
